message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $11,000 is lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This still allows me to make a reasonable profit, and I believe it's a fair price considering the value this product can bring to your business.
Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13,000. I'd be willing to meet you halfway and offer $12,500. Can you consider that?
